q: DALLAS-- The Mayor Tom of Dallas says he did not sanction giving Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick a key to the city. Michael Vick won The Associated Press Comeback Player of the Year award this past season, his second in the NFL since serving 18 months in prison for operating a dogfighting operation. Police said the inquiry was being moved from the Metropolitan Police's counter-terrorism command and would now be led by a specialist crime unit. This work will be carried out by the specialist crime directorate which has been investigating a related phone hacking allegation since September 2010, said the police. The News of the World's royal correspondent Clive Goodman was jailed in 2007 for conspiracy to access mobile phone messages involving Princes William and Harry.
